meanings.sent1: The cookie was dippable in the milk.
meanings.sent2: The chocolate was smooth and dippable.
meanings.sent3: The dippable marshmallow made the campfire even more fun.
meanings.sent4: Her words were dippable in honey, sweet and enticing.
meanings.sent5: The dippable candle wax hardened into beautiful shapes.

meanings.sent1: The strawberries were dippable in the chocolate fondue.
meanings.sent2: The chips were crispy and dippable in the salsa.
meanings.sent3: The dippable pretzels disappeared quickly at the party.
meanings.sent4: The night was dippable in mystery, waiting to be explored.
meanings.sent5: The dippable sauce added a burst of flavor to the dish.
